meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>eat</kanji> and find yourself in the <kanji>middle</kanji> of <kanji>poison</kanji>, you've probably got <vocabulary>food poisoning</vocabulary>. No fun when you get this :(
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
